author: Zack Budryk
title: India, Thailand, Germany warn of punishment for coronavirus misinformation on April Fool's Day
description: Several nations, including Thailand, Germany and India, have warned against spreading coronavirus-related misinformation on April Fool's Day, with some countries threatening jail time for perpetrators.
content:
Several nations, including Thailand, Germany and India, have warned against spreading coronavirus-related misinformation on April Fools Day, with some countries threatening jail time for perpetrators.
